body: 1: Jane Eyre  Cathy Marston’s new work extracts the radical and romantic heart from the Charlotte Brontë classic for Northern Ballet, with a score by Philip Feeney that incorporates music by the 19th-century composer Fanny Mendelssohn.   Cast, Doncaster, Thu to 21 May 2: Fagin’s Twist  The superbly inventive choreographer Tony Adigun puts a unique hip-hop spin on Charles Dickens’s Oliver Twist.   Wyvern Theatre, Swindon, Tue; The Lowry, Salford, Fri to 21 May 3: Nederlands Dans Theater 2   The 18 sleekly athletic and expressive young dancers who make up NDT 2 are the junior wing of that country’s leading contemporary dance company. For this UK tour they bring their usually impressive and eclectic repertory.  Sadler’s Wells, EC1, Tue to Fri
webTitle: Three of the best… new dance performances
